Description:
Impressively-sized, Family Grandeur
Magnificently proportioned for growing families and filled with natural light, this grand, 4 bedroom, executive townhouse has been meticulously crafted with an eye for quality and is beautifully presented in as new condition. Superbly appointed from top-to-bottom, just moments from Westfield Doncaster and merely metres from the Park & Ride, the home is remarkably easy to maintain, making it the perfect option for families with better things to do than spend their weekends in the garden.
A liberal use of CaesarStone in the kitchen and all the bathrooms combines with beautiful polished Tasmanian Oak floors to make a clear statement about enduring designer quality. Meanwhile, a vast open-plan living area highlights a mixture of SMEG and Bosch kitchen appliances as it flows easily outdoors to a wrap-around deck for an easy al fresco lifestyle.
Importantly for families, the home offers a diversity of living spaces. Indeed, a rumpus / TV room at the rear of the home looks out to the backyard, whilst upstairs, another living room / retreat could also be used as an open study area. As dictated by the needs of families, the home offers wonderful flexibility.
Two of the bedrooms feature private ensuites both are fully-tiled luxury domains with twin basin vanities and both with walk-in robes, whilst the other two bedrooms also feature built-in robes. The central family bathroom is a large space with an independent bath and frameless-screened shower as well as a stone-topped, twin basin vanity to match both ensuites.
More than just a showpiece, however, the home has been designed for functionality with huge amounts of attic storage which is above the double garage and easily accessed from within the main home, as well as volumes of under-stair storage. Add to this the convenience of direct internal access to the main home via the garage and the home is a pure joy to live in.
Additional features include a walk-in kitchen pantry, secure video entry, a stone-benched powder room, laundry, solar system, ducted vacuum and zoned heating / air conditioning.
Discover the reasons why Doncaster is thriving. Aside from easy access to all the cafes, shops and cinemas of Westfield Doncaster, you can access the city via the Eastern Freeway or utilise the Park & Ride, plus there are great schools, parkland and Box Hill Central is just down the road.
